title: the fact that first timing a new champ in ranked isnt reportable just goes to show how fun this is
body:
plat 1 elo players first timing xayah just to "have fun" in ranked solo queue

having to work 3x as hard to carry someone that went 1-8 in laning phase but got carried and got to say "gg easy" at the end of the game as if he did anything whatsoever but be a dickhead towards his teammates.


having to literally ask my team in champ select if they are playing new champs so i can ban the actual op champs instead of having to ban someone my jackass of a teammate wanted to ruin the game with.


thank god i carried because if i lost this one i was most definitely going to join them and jst start trolling every game i play.



enough of this shit riot.


the next champ select i get another 1st time xayah who i beg nto to play her and she says idgaf and picks eve adc

http://prntscr.com/eyj36r



this is true solo queue.

not the bullshit silver "positivity rules" cancer that the mods spread around.
